sentences: The SBI Plenary addressed capacity building on Tuesday, 11 June.
Chair Estrada noted that frameworks for building capacity in developing countries and EITs were adopted at COP-7.
The G-77/China welcomed funding to facilitate implementing capacity- building activities. Draft conclusions were presented to the SBI Plenary Friday, 14 June, and adopted without amendment.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
